title: fouRplebsAPI
text: R package fouRplebsAPI enables researchers query 4chan database archived 4plebs.org. database largest ongoing archive ever-disappearing posts imageboard 4chan. package researchers can use detailed search functionalities offered 4plebs retrieve structured data communication 4chan. package based 4plebs API documentation. 4chan boards currently covered 4plebs :

title: fouRplebsAPI
text: can install fouRplebsAPI GitHub :

title: fouRplebsAPI
text: package includes several funtions allow researchers query inspect specific 4chan posts (get_4chan_post) threads (get_4chan_thread), researchers wanting collect data 4plebs archive probably interested collecting larger amount data. first way collecting data collecting latest threads given board. Let’s say interested 20 latest threads “Advice” board (excluding comments accompanying opening post), one way querying data : output description can found function documentations. Theoretically possible scrape vast ranges archive function, even though API API rate limit, slows querying process. second way collecting 4chan data package search function. 4plebs allows detailed search many search filter. show simple examples data can collected fouRplebsAPI. example show rather cheerful, like avoid controversial topics 4chan, especially /pol/ board notorious. Researchers, instance ones interested political communication actors contentious ideologies, find easy adapt example. one vacation. Let’s find communication “Travel” board discusses Mallorca, Spain. First, get first impression search results, one can inspect snippet 25 recent posts containing search term “mallorca”. Note function search_4chan_snippet() also prints total number search results estimated time retrieve search_4chan(). estimation based 5 requests per minute API limit. Users interested number results can just retrieve changing parameter result_type “results_num”. Now one can compare number posts mentioning Mallorca different time periods. example, pre-pandemic vs. post-pandemic: seems island mentioned people tended stay home. Researchers interested gathering data just snippet posts can use function search_4chan(). Staying example posts mentioning Mallorca time, one inclined ask, whether image Mallorca changed pandemic. Apart simply getting posts mentioning search term, example possible filter posts containing image data: column media_link provides downloadable image links posts retrieved.
code: library(fouRplebsAPI)  recentAdv <- get_4chan_board_range(board = "adv", page_start = 1, page_stop = 2, latest_comments = FALSE)  str(recentAdv, vec.len = 1, nchar.max = 60) #> 'data.frame':    20 obs. of  15 variables: #>  $ thread_id          : chr  "26702594" ... #>  $ doc_id             : chr  "13005259" ... #>  $ num                : chr  "26702594" ... #>  $ subnum             : chr  "0" ... #>  $ op                 : num  1 1 ... #>  $ timestamp          : int  1655369878 1655369475 ... #>  $ fourchan_date      : chr  "6/16/22(Thu)4:57" ... #>  $ name               : chr  "Anonymous" ... #>  $ title              : logi  NA ... #>  $ referencing_comment: logi  NA ... #>  $ comments           : chr  "My family is pathological so they can't sup"| __truncated__ ... #>  $ poster_country     : logi  NA ... #>  $ nreplies           : logi  NA ... #>  $ formatted          : logi  FALSE ... #>  $ media_link         : logi  NA ... mallorca_snippet <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2021-01-01", end_date = "2022-12-31", text = "mallorca") #> The 1 - 25 oldest posts of the 78 total search results are shown. #> Scraping all 78 results would take ~ 1.33 minutes.  str(mallorca_snippet, vec.len = 1, nchar.max = 60) #> 'data.frame':    25 obs. of  15 variables: #>  $ thread_id          : chr  "1938850" ... #>  $ doc_id             : chr  "1113628" ... #>  $ num                : chr  "1938924" ... #>  $ subnum             : chr  "0" ... #>  $ op                 : num  0 1 ... #>  $ timestamp          : int  1610611412 1611403974 ... #>  $ fourchan_date      : chr  "1/14/21(Thu)3:03" ... #>  $ name               : chr  "Anonymous" ... #>  $ title              : chr  NA ... #>  $ referencing_comment: chr  "1938909\n" ... #>  $ comments           : chr  ">got murdered and/or raped in shitholes ove"| __truncated__ ... #>  $ poster_country     : logi  NA ... #>  $ nreplies           : int  NA 13 ... #>  $ formatted          : logi  FALSE ... #>  $ media_link         : chr  NA ... mallorca_pre <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", result_type = "results_num") mallorca_post <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2020-01-01", end_date = "2021-12-31", text = "mallorca", result_type = "results_num")  data.frame("Years" = c("2018 & 2019", "2020 & 2021"),        "Total results" = c(mallorca_pre["total_found"], mallorca_post["total_found"])        ) #>         Years Total.results #> 1 2018 & 2019            86 #> 2 2020 & 2021            99 mallorca_pre_pics <- search_4chan(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", show_only = "image") #> [1] "Approximate time: 0.67 minutes." mallorca_post_pics <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", show_only = "image") #> The 1 - 16 oldest posts of the 16 total search results are shown. #> Scraping all 16 results would take ~ 0.33 minutes.  head(mallorca_post_pics$media_link) #> [1] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1521713616876.jpg" #> [2] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1525249686528.jpg" #> [3] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1527534752103.jpg" #> [4] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1527865867839.jpg" #> [5] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1533082869505.jpg" #> [6] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1547062117808.jpg"

title: R package for accessing 4chan posts via the 4plebs.org API
text: package includes several funtions allow researchers query inspect specific 4chan posts (get_4chan_post) threads (get_4chan_thread), researchers wanting collect data 4plebs archive probably interested collecting larger amount data. first way collecting data collecting latest threads given board. Let’s say interested 20 latest threads “Advice” board (excluding comments accompanying opening post), one way querying data : output description can found function documentations. Theoretically possible scrape vast ranges archive function, even though API API rate limit, slows querying process. second way collecting 4chan data package search function. 4plebs allows detailed search many search filter. show simple examples data can collected fouRplebsAPI. example show rather cheerful, like avoid controversial topics 4chan, especially /pol/ board notorious. Researchers, instance ones interested political communication actors contentious ideologies, find easy adapt example. one vacation. Let’s find communication “Travel” board discusses Mallorca, Spain. First, get first impression search results, one can inspect snippet 25 recent posts containing search term “mallorca”. Note function search_4chan_snippet() also prints total number search results estimated time retrieve search_4chan(). estimation based 5 requests per minute API limit. Users interested number results can just retrieve changing parameter result_type “results_num”. Now one can compare number posts mentioning Mallorca different time periods. example, pre-pandemic vs. post-pandemic: seems island mentioned people tended stay home. Researchers interested gathering data just snippet posts can use function search_4chan(). Staying example posts mentioning Mallorca time, one inclined ask, whether image Mallorca changed pandemic. Apart simply getting posts mentioning search term, example possible filter posts containing image data: column media_link provides downloadable image links posts retrieved.
code: library(fouRplebsAPI)  recentAdv <- get_4chan_board_range(board = "adv", page_start = 1, page_stop = 2, latest_comments = FALSE)  str(recentAdv, vec.len = 1, nchar.max = 60) #> 'data.frame':    20 obs. of  15 variables: #>  $ thread_id          : chr  "26681983" ... #>  $ doc_id             : chr  "12984655" ... #>  $ num                : chr  "26681983" ... #>  $ subnum             : chr  "0" ... #>  $ op                 : num  1 1 ... #>  $ timestamp          : int  1655111247 1655110365 ... #>  $ fourchan_date      : chr  "6/13/22(Mon)5:07" ... #>  $ name               : chr  "Anonymous" ... #>  $ title              : logi  NA ... #>  $ referencing_comment: logi  NA ... #>  $ comments           : chr  "I have a very good friend. Maybe one of my "| __truncated__ ... #>  $ poster_country     : logi  NA ... #>  $ nreplies           : logi  NA ... #>  $ formatted          : logi  FALSE ... #>  $ media_link         : logi  NA ... mallorca_snippet <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2021-01-01", end_date = "2022-12-31", text = "mallorca") #> The 1 - 25 oldest posts of the 78 total search results are shown. #> Scraping all 78 results would take ~ 1.33 minutes.  str(mallorca_snippet, vec.len = 1, nchar.max = 60) #> 'data.frame':    25 obs. of  15 variables: #>  $ thread_id          : chr  "1938850" ... #>  $ doc_id             : chr  "1113628" ... #>  $ num                : chr  "1938924" ... #>  $ subnum             : chr  "0" ... #>  $ op                 : num  0 1 ... #>  $ timestamp          : int  1610611412 1611403974 ... #>  $ fourchan_date      : chr  "1/14/21(Thu)3:03" ... #>  $ name               : chr  "Anonymous" ... #>  $ title              : chr  NA ... #>  $ referencing_comment: chr  "1938909\n" ... #>  $ comments           : chr  ">got murdered and/or raped in shitholes ove"| __truncated__ ... #>  $ poster_country     : logi  NA ... #>  $ nreplies           : int  NA 13 ... #>  $ formatted          : logi  FALSE ... #>  $ media_link         : chr  NA ... mallorca_pre <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", result_type = "results_num") mallorca_post <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2020-01-01", end_date = "2021-12-31", text = "mallorca", result_type = "results_num")  data.frame("Years" = c("2018 & 2019", "2020 & 2021"),        "Total results" = c(mallorca_pre["total_found"], mallorca_post["total_found"])        ) #>         Years Total.results #> 1 2018 & 2019            86 #> 2 2020 & 2021            99 mallorca_pre_pics <- search_4chan(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", show_only = "image") #> [1] "Approximate time: 0.33 minutes." mallorca_post_pics <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "trv", start_date = "2018-01-01", end_date = "2019-12-31", text = "mallorca", show_only = "image") #> The 1 - 16 oldest posts of the 16 total search results are shown. #> Scraping all 16 results would take ~ 0.33 minutes.  head(mallorca_post_pics$media_link) #> [1] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1521713616876.jpg" #> [2] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1525249686528.jpg" #> [3] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1527534752103.jpg" #> [4] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1527865867839.jpg" #> [5] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1533082869505.jpg" #> [6] "http://i.4pcdn.org/trv/1547062117808.jpg"

title: R package for accessing 4chan posts via the 4plebs.org API
text: fouRplebsAPI helpful research, please cite : Buehling, K. (2022). fouRplebsAPI: R package accessing 4chan posts via 4plebs.org API (Version 0.9.0). https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6637440

what: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
title: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
text: function returns 10 threads given board page index, starting latest thread

title: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
text: board Character variable 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". page Integer board page index latest_comments Boolean, TRUE: Return opening posts replies, FALSE: Return opening posts, Default: TRUE cool Integer (seconds), 4plebs API includes undocumented API rate limit board index search. multiple searches cool-recommended , Default: 0

title: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
text: Dataframe details posts given board page.

title: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post

title: Return threads for specific 4chan board index — get_4chan_board_index
code: if (FALSE) { get_4chan_board_index(board = "mo", page = 1, latest_comments = TRUE)  get_4chan_board_index(board = "mo", page = 1, latest_comments = FALSE) }

what: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
text: function returns threads range board page indices, starting latest thread

title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
code: get_4chan_board_range(   board,   page_start,   page_stop,   latest_comments = TRUE,   cool = 5 )

title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
text: board Character variable 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". page_start Integer, Start page range page_stop Integer, End page range latest_comments Boolean, TRUE: Return opening posts replies, FALSE: Return opening posts, Default: TRUE cool Integer (seconds), 4plebs API includes undocumented API rate limit, cool-period recommended. , Default: 5

title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
text: Dataframe details posts given board page.

title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post

title: Return threads for a range of 4chan board indices — get_4chan_board_range
code: if (FALSE) { get_4chan_board_range(board = "o", page_start = 1, page_stop = 2)  get_4chan_board_range(board = "o", page_start = 1, page_stop = 2, latest_comments = TRUE) }

title: Return specific 4chan post — get_4chan_post
text: Return 4chan post looking ID

title: Return specific 4chan post — get_4chan_post
text: board Character variable 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". post_id Integer value post ID.

title: Return specific 4chan post — get_4chan_post
text: Dataframe post details.

title: Return specific 4chan post — get_4chan_post
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post

title: Return specific 4chan thread — get_4chan_thread
text: Return 4chan thread looking ID

title: Return specific 4chan thread — get_4chan_thread
text: board Character variable 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". thread_id Dataframe details posts thread.

title: Return specific 4chan thread — get_4chan_thread
text: Dataframe details posts thread.

title: Return specific 4chan thread — get_4chan_thread
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
text: function returns 4chan posts specified searchterms

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
code: search_4chan(   start_date = "",   end_date = "",   boards,   text = "",   subject = "",   filename = "",   ghost = "all",   user_id = "",   tripcode = "",   type = "all",   username = "",   country = "",   results = "all",   show_only = "all",   deleted = "all",   capcode = "user",   order = "asc",   cool = 20 )

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
text: start_date String, Start date post search. Format: "YYY-MM-DD", Default: '' end_date String, End date post search. Format: "YYY-MM-DD", Default: '' boards String string vector 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". text String, Searchterms post text. Regex possible, Default: '' subject String, Searchterms post subject. Regex possible, Default: '' filename String, Searchterms filename. Regex possible, Default: '' ghost String, Filter : "", "", "none" , Default: '' user_id Integer, Filter user_id, Default: '' tripcode String, Filter tripcode, Default: '' type String, Filter post type: "", "sticky", "op", "posts", Default: '' username String, Search username, Default: '' country String, Filter country. Format: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code, Default: '' results String, Return post matches thread found . Possible values: "", "thread", Default: '' show_only String, Show posts containing data types: "", "text", "image", Default: '' deleted String, Filter deletion status: "", "-deleted", "deleted", Default: '' capcode String, Filter author type: "", "user", "ver", "mod", "dev", "admin", "manager", "founder", Default: '' order String, Return posts ordered latest oldest: "asc", "desc", Default: 'asc' cool Integer (seconds), 4plebs API includes API rate limit 5 requests/min archive search. multiple searches cool-recommended , Default: 20

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
text: Dataframe details posts found.

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID  subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post

title: Search all 4chan posts — search_4chan
code: if (FALSE) { search_4chan(boards = "trv", start_date = "2021-04-20",     end_date = "2022-12-21", text = "mallorca|menorca")  search_4chan(boards = "o", text = "simson", show_only = "image") }

what: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
text: function returns latest oldest 4chan posts specified searchterms

title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
code: search_4chan_snippet(   start_date = "",   end_date = "",   boards,   text = "",   subject = "",   filename = "",   ghost = "all",   user_id = "",   tripcode = "",   type = "all",   username = "",   country = "",   results = "all",   show_only = "all",   deleted = "all",   capcode = "all",   order = "asc",   cool = 0,   page = 1,   result_type = "snippet" )

title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
text: start_date String, Start date post search. Format: "YYY-MM-DD", Default: '' end_date String, End date post search. Format: "YYY-MM-DD", Default: '' boards String string vector 4chan board. Available boards : "adv", "plebs", "hr", "tg", "tv", "x", "s4s", "pol", "o", "trv", "f", "sp", "mlpol", "mo". text String, Searchterms post text. Regex possible, Default: '' subject String, Searchterms post subject. Regex possible, Default: '' filename String, Searchterms filename. Regex possible, Default: '' ghost String, Filter : "", "", "none" , Default: '' user_id Integer, Filter user_id, Default: '' tripcode String, Filter tripcode, Default: '' type String, Filter post type: "", "sticky", "op", "posts", Default: '' username String, Search username, Default: '' country String, Filter country. Format: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code, Default: '' results String, Return post matches thread found . Possible values: "", "thread", Default: '' show_only String, Show posts containing data types: "", "text", "image", Default: '' deleted String, Filter deletion status: "", "-deleted", "deleted", Default: '' capcode String, Filter author type: "", "user", "ver", "mod", "dev", "admin", "manager", "founder", Default: '' order String, Return posts ordered latest oldest: "asc", "desc", Default: 'asc' cool Integer (seconds), 4plebs API includes API rate limit 5 requests/min archive search. multiple searches cool-recommended , Default: 0 page Index search result, Default: 1 result_type String, Return output post level number posts found: "snippet", "results_num", Default: 'snippet'

title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
text: Dataframe details recent/oldest posts found.

title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
text: Variables API output: thread_id: 4chan ID thread post situated doc_id: 4chan document ID num: 4chan post ID subnum: Binary, 1: Ghost Post, 0: Non-Ghost Post op: Binary, 1: Opening Post, 0: Reply Post timestamp: Time sent Posix time fourchan_date: Time sent name: Author name title: Post title referencing_comment: post_id post quoting comments: Text post poster_country: Author country nreplies: Number replies formatted: Boolean, post formatted? media_link: Download link media (e.g. images) shared post result_type "results_num": total_found: number total posts found query actual_query_result: 4plebs API limits search results shown. limit 100,000 results. number total posts found exceeds limit, actual_query_results capped.

title: Seach latest or oldest 4chan posts — search_4chan_snippet
code: if (FALSE) { t <- search_4chan_snippet(boards = "adv", text = "kitties", show_only = "image")  search_4chan_snippet(boards = "pol", country = "BR", result_type = "results_num") }
